entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
